docs.abstract: Sports is a niche area in radio over all, but it is increasingly attractive to marketers who want to reach an engaged audience that is primarily male.
docs.snippet: Sports is a niche area in radio over all, but it is increasingly attractive to marketers who want to reach an engaged audience that is primarily male.
docs.lead_paragraph: Sports programming isn’t the most popular stop on the radio dial in Portland, Ore.

headline.main: To Reach Men, Advertisers Dial In to Sports Radio
headline.print_headline: To Reach Men, Dial In to Sports Radio

docs.abstract: The same traits that have made Mr. Musk a great entrepreneur also make him a potentially troublesome chief executive. Tesla’s board should act as a filter.
docs.snippet: The same traits that have made Mr. Musk a great entrepreneur also make him a potentially troublesome chief executive. Tesla’s board should act as a filter.
docs.lead_paragraph: There’s no question that Elon Musk is one of the great entrepreneurs of this era. He may even be in “a class of one,” as he recently described Tesla, the revolutionary electric car company he founded.

headline.main: A Question for Tesla’s Board: What Was Elon Musk’s Mental State?
headline.print_headline: Inside the Mind of a Visionary

docs.abstract: The Tesla chief executive addressed a wide range of issues, including the search for a chief operating officer and his tweet that sent the company’s shares soaring.
docs.snippet: The Tesla chief executive addressed a wide range of issues, including the search for a chief operating officer and his tweet that sent the company’s shares soaring.
docs.lead_paragraph: Tesla is not considering hiring a second in command, the electric carmaker’s founder and chief executive, Elon Musk, said in wide-ranging comments to The New York Times.

headline.main: 5 Takeaways From Elon Musk’s Interview With The Times About Tesla

docs.abstract: Reports will show whether the housing market continued to slow in July, and Greece officially ends its reliance on financial bailouts.
docs.snippet: Reports will show whether the housing market continued to slow in July, and Greece officially ends its reliance on financial bailouts.
docs.lead_paragraph: Here’s what to expect in the week ahead:

headline.main: China Trade Talks Resume, and the Fed Chairman Will Speak
headline.print_headline: U.S.-China Talks Resume; Fed Chairman Will Speak

docs.abstract: More bank customers are going digital. Still, safe deposit boxes are good for documents and valuables that you usually don’t need on short notice.
docs.snippet: More bank customers are going digital. Still, safe deposit boxes are good for documents and valuables that you usually don’t need on short notice.
docs.lead_paragraph: As personal banking goes digital, safe deposit boxes may seem a relic from the analog age. Yet some people still want the security of storage away from home for valuables, important papers and sentimental keepsakes, financial advisers say.

headline.main: What You Need to Know About Safe Deposit Boxes
headline.print_headline: What You Need to Know  About Safe Deposit Boxes

docs.abstract: If you’re not ready to buy a whole new system, you might be able to add new parts and upgrade your aging machine for less than a few hundred dollars.
docs.snippet: If you’re not ready to buy a whole new system, you might be able to add new parts and upgrade your aging machine for less than a few hundred dollars.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. My computer is old, and defragmenting the drive is not going to make it any faster. I can add memory chips, but what else can I do to speed things up without spending a ton or buying a new machine?

headline.main: Give Your Old Computer New Life

docs.abstract: Standard SMS text and email may not protect the privacy of your correspondence, but apps that encrypt your chats lock up your messages from those who might read them.
docs.snippet: Standard SMS text and email may not protect the privacy of your correspondence, but apps that encrypt your chats lock up your messages from those who might read them.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. What are the advantages of using a messenger app like Signal? Does everybody I want to communicate with have to use it as well?

headline.main: Keep Your Electronic Communications Really Secure

docs.abstract: You can clear the clutter from your coffee table with electronic editions of your favorite periodicals.
docs.snippet: You can clear the clutter from your coffee table with electronic editions of your favorite periodicals.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. I subscribed to the digital version of a magazine from England and downloaded it, but it’s not showing up in my iPad’s books library. How do I find it?

docs.abstract: When it comes to online comments and discourse and what you can do to limit their toxicity, you only have a certain amount of power. The real leverage lies with the tech companies.
docs.snippet: When it comes to online comments and discourse and what you can do to limit their toxicity, you only have a certain amount of power. The real leverage lies with the tech companies.
docs.lead_paragraph: This column is going to be a bit unusual. Typically, I write about a broad tech problem and offer some solutions. But this week, I’ve stumbled into a topic that many agree has no easy fix: online comments.

headline.main: The Internet Trolls Have Won. Sorry, There’s Not Much You Can Do.
headline.print_headline: The Internet Trolls Have Won. Get Used to It.

docs.abstract: Jessica Bennett, gender editor for The Times, talks about diversifying reporting subjects, monitoring how many times she gets interrupted and why you should follow her dog.
docs.snippet: Jessica Bennett, gender editor for The Times, talks about diversifying reporting subjects, monitoring how many times she gets interrupted and why you should follow her dog.
docs.lead_paragraph: How do New York Times journalists use technology in their jobs and in their personal lives? Jessica Bennett, gender editor for The Times, discussed the tech she’s using.

headline.main: Managing Manterruptions and Her Dog’s Instagram
headline.print_headline: Managing Manterruptions and a Pet’s Instagram
